Question
========

One pure coin is thrown up four times. *A* is the event: the first two times head lies on top, and then coin lies on top twice. What then is the probability of *A*?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2
* 1/4
* 3/4
* 1/16

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2: Incorrect
* 1/4: Incorrect
* 3/4: Incorrect
* 1/16: Correct
